alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:58PM EDT until July 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Western Menifee County in east central Kentucky... South central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Western Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 458 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Sideview to 7 miles northwest of Cressy to near Harris Ferry, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Iron Mound around 510 PM EDT. Camargo around 515 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Jeffersonville, Stanton, Owingsville and Wyoming. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan
